Summary: THree red lights in the shape of a triangle with a fourth in the center
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 11:45 I was heading home from a family members house and I saw three lights in the shape of a triangle with a fourth in the center. My car was facing north. They were moving from the west to the east, and slowly pulsating vibrant red. They would occiasionally move forwards in small intervals and then stop. One light completely disappeared and then the three remaining lights formed a straight line. Then two of the lights began to head towards each other and suddenly one stopped and made a 90 degree turn and shot upward at an incredible rate and then disappeared. The two remain lights stopped moving and then faded out.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around May 14th 2008
